conclusion: Identify the parts of the system including block A on a 30° incline, a light rope over pulleys, and block B.
The tension is the same everywhere in the rope.
For block A, tension T equals m g sin 30° = ½ m g.
For the movable pulley, the upward force is T √2.
The downward force on the pulley is m_B g.
The mass of block B must be m_B = m / √2.
